src.controller module

class src.controller.BrowsermonController[source]

Bases: object

config_reader(conf_file_path='C:\\browsermon\\browsermon.conf', defaults=None)[source]

Function reads the config file and returns a dictionary of options if the platform is windows then the default directory is C:rowsermonrwosermon.conf otherwise for linux it is /opt/browsermon/browsermon.conf

Args: conf_file_path: path to config file

get_installed_browsers()[source]

Function returns a set of browsers installed on the system. For windows it uses ‘reg’ library to read windows registry and fetch the installed browsers. For Linux it uses a simple command of ‘which’

Function returns a set of browsers installed on the system. For windows it uses ‘reg’ library to read windows registry and fetch the installed browsers. For Linux it uses a simple command of ‘which’

Args: None

Returns: set of browsers installed on the system
